distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gimp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-17784: Fixed an insufficient string validation for input names (bsc#1073624).
- CVE-2017-17785: Fixed an heap-based buffer overflow in FLI import (bsc#1073625).
- CVE-2017-17786: Fixed an out-of-bounds read in TGA (bsc#1073626).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in load_image in plug-ins/common/file-gbr.c in the gbr import parser, related to mishandling of UTF-8 data.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in ReadImage in plug-ins/common/file-tga.c (related to bgr2rgb.part.1) via an unexpected bits-per-pixel value for an RGBA image.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
